question: Who are the Freemasons and what are the opinions of our Ulema regarding them ?
answer:
QUESTION
According to many they are a worldwide network of people who are constantly putting schemes in place to distroy Islam (Na-u-zubillah) but somebody i know is a freemason and he says that they are a group of Multi faith people who encourage each other to make their faith stronger and to improve upon the practice of their religeon.
